outputs.output_descr:
The "National e-Governance Network Initiative" is supporting the rapid and coordinated expansion of e-Governance in the Republic of Azerbaijan. 
The project strategy focuses on following outputs: 
1.	The creation of National Internet Infrastructure and e-Government Network that can provide robust, affordable, accessible and secure connectivity for all governmental institutions and other clients. 
2.	The establishment of on-line access to government information through public access kiosks.
3.	Support to the Ministry of Communication and Information Technologies in facing the challenge of running the Network and maximizing impact of the new Ministry in due course of implementation of the relevant activities.

project_descr: National Information and Communication Technologies Startegy (NICTS) II - National e-Governance Network Initiative
